definition: public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Please add 50 yuan into my card.
They put their money in a fare-box or use a public transportation card instead.
sentences.chinese: 他们把钱放在投币箱里或用一张交通卡替代。

sentences.english: Hi, I'd like to buy a transportation card.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我想买一张交通卡。

sentences.english: Where can I recharge my card, please?
sentences.chinese: 请问交通卡充值在哪里？

sentences.english: P: Please add 50 yuan into my card.
I'm going to top up my public transportation card.
sentences.chinese: 我打算充值一下我的交通卡。

sentences.english: Sure. I will check the card on the test machine first.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我先把交通卡放到检测仪上，帮您看一下。

sentences.english: Where can I recharge my transportation card?
sentences.chinese: 请问我得到哪里去给我的交通卡充值？

sentences.english: Each household will receive a 200-yuan (US$29.30) public transport card commemoratingthe event as another bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每家还将获赠一张200元人民币的交通卡。

sentences.english: She offered to donate them to a charitable group.
sentences.chinese: 她愿意把交通卡捐献给一个慈善机构。

sentences.english: P: Where can I recharge my card, please?
sentences.chinese: 请问交通卡充值在哪里？

definition: EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
